Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 51st overall pick, by Brooklyn in 2017...
Injured on 6/7/2017 with a Broken Ribs, out for 5-6 weeks...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/11/2018, off Oscar Quinto (SEA)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/13/2018, off Daniel Theobald (HOU)...
Released by Brooklyn on 9/17/2020...
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 2/25/2021 to a 1-year deal worth $750,000 per year...
